original_title: The Kids of Santa Fe: The Largest Unknown Mass Shooting
overview: On 2018 a student at Santa Fe High School executed 10 people and wounded 13 others. The shooting took half an hour before the killer was arrested. The movie is about the students that were directly affected and what they are doing today.
tagline: On 5/18/2018 the unthinkable occurred to kids at Santa Fe high school. Here are their stories.
title: The Kids of Santa Fe: The Largest Unknown Mass Shooting
